price: Adeε biara no Yabͻ no mmienu mmienu (onini ne ͻbedeε) sεdeε mobεkaeε.
arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamin kulli shayin khalaqnā zawjayni laʿallakum tadhakkarūna
